description:
J asks the one person who understands his situation, Headmaster Mikuni, to let him use his old mansion as the student council room. J was able to reunite with his old friend Hayakawa, who may know what happened to Tenna, but he doesn’t seem to remember anything. Jay frantically continues to look for clues and tries to hunt Hayakawa down again. Meanwhile, weird rumors were spreading about Hayakawa, which was affecting the business at the café that he worked at. It was quite popular because Hayakawa was rather handsome, but somehow that took an ugly turn. Apparently, someone was spreading rumors that Hayakawa was making unwanted advances to the women who would visit the café...
Source: crunchyroll
